SELECT p.bio, u.name, u.email FROM profiles p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.gender = 'Female';
SELECT u.name, pre.theme FROM users u LEFT JOIN preferences pre ON u.user_id = pre.user_id WHERE pre.language = 'English';
SELECT u.name, u.email, pre.theme, pre.language FROM users u JOIN preferences pre ON u.user_id = pre.user_id WHERE pre.theme = 'Dark';

SELECT up.name, pn.phone_number FROM UserProfiles up JOIN PhoneNumbers pn ON up.id = pn.user_id;
